mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.pid AS pId, m.`menuName` AS `name`, IF(m.`deep` < 3,TRUE,FALSE) AS isParent, IF(m.`deep`=1,TRUE,FALSE) AS `open`, t.menuId, IF(t.menuId IS NOT NULL,TRUE,FALSE) AS `checked` FROM `sys_menu` m LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `sys_role_menu` rm WHERE rm.roleId = #{roleId}) t ON t.menuId = m.`id`
